root: ^Olera : 	“If that is not the town’s hero I see! How’s your little brother, not taken your place yet?”
^Player: 	“ Well, he’s definitely trying to, and with his ambition he’ll overthrow me any minute!”
^Olera : “Oh how I remember how you started training back in the day, weren’t you just cute?
^Olera : Why don’t you come back later and get yourselves a nice treat for that hard training“
